text:
Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Amendment Act 2023

An Act to amend the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Act 2006
[Royal Assent 21 September 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Amendment Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

3. Principal Act
    In this Act, the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Act 2006 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Act 2006 .

5. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which it commenced.
